name: Urban Planning
description:
In Urban Planner you play as a tiny dude who has to build a lot of houses. 

Unfortunately the area is full of blob monsters. 

Kill them all with houses to proceed to the next area!

Don't use all the space you have though. If you put too many houses in an area, you'll RUN OUT OF SPACE.

Controls :

Keyboard/Mouse : wasd or arrows to move, space to dodge, left click to build houses

Gamepad : Left stick to move, right stick to shoot, A to dodge

Credits  :

All code, design, 3D modeling, UI stuff, music, sound effects by Renaud Forestié

Game created for #LDJAM42 in 47 hours and 50 minutes.

Tools used :

Unity, Blender, Oculus Medium, Photoshop, After Effects, Github, Garage Band, 3D Coat, Spotify
